head.layout:
# TOML layout sheet [default_layout] space_size = ["auto", "auto", "auto"] pos_x = "min" pos_y = "min" pos_z = "min"
[[layouts]] selector = "#room" space_size = [5000, 3000, 2500] # 5m x 3m x 2.5m pos_x = "center" pos_y = "center" pos_z = "min"
[[layouts]] selector = "#table" space_size = [1500, 800, 750] # 1.5m x 0.8m x 0.75m pos_x = "center" pos_y = "center" pos_z = "50cm"
